articles.title: 1. Feeding
articles.description: Everyone needs to eat! Learn how to fill your pets bowl or what type of food they like to eat!

articles.title: 2. Walking
articles.description: Make sure your pet gets to move around and has space!

articles.title: 3. Cleaning
articles.description: Clean up duty is important! Clean your pets mess. Make sure you clean their hands when you're done!

articles.title: 4. Grooming
articles.description: Grooming! Learn how to wash your dog and brush them to make them as clean as you!

articles.title: 5. Playing!
articles.description: The Fun part! Make sure you and your pet are having fun and spend time with them but not too much!
